meanings.definition: A papal letter sent to all bishops of the Roman Catholic Church.
meanings.sent1: The encyclicals were read by all the bishops.
meanings.sent2: The encyclicals provided guidance to the bishops.
meanings.sent3: The encyclicals made the bishops' heads spin with all the information.
meanings.sent4: The encyclicals were like a beacon of light in the darkness for the bishops.
meanings.sent5: The encyclicals were as important as a treasure map for the bishops.

meanings.definition: A letter from the pope to the clergy on matters of doctrine or discipline.
meanings.sent1: The encyclicals were eagerly awaited by the clergy.
meanings.sent2: The encyclicals addressed important issues for the clergy.
meanings.sent3: The encyclicals brought a smile to the faces of the clergy.
meanings.sent4: The encyclicals were a wake-up call for the clergy.
meanings.sent5: The encyclicals were like a compass guiding the clergy's actions.
